Reviews.Title: I love the phone but it is att branded
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: I chose to buy this phone because i travel back and forth from europe and needed a phone thath would allow mw to switch sim cards and be ready to go.This is a gsm unloked device wich means that it will work with any gsm carier like at&t; or any "telekom" client in europe sutch as "tim"and t-mobile germany.The phone looks amazing and the quality is good for the price.in the us i use this phone on att Gophone network  so the fact that it sais at&t; on it does not bother me.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Lynn Murphy
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this phone, my first smart phone, easy to figure out, like having windows. No negatives to report.

Reviews.Title: muy buen telefono
Reviews.Author: Yoel
Reviews.Content: Relamente lo recomiendo muy buen telefono hasta ahora lo he usado y no tengo quejas de el muy elegante, practico y de facil uso

Reviews.Title: Phone arrived on time. It looks great.
Reviews.Author: Joseph Yaro
Reviews.Content: It is a beautiful phone. I am using it abroad and hope that all functions work. I am not a modern guy so I will need only email, skype in addition to traditional phone functions.

brand new Nokia Lumia 900
GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100
